alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 11:55PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dawson County through 1230 AM CDT... At 1155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Callaway to 8 miles north of Willow Island to Gothenburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cozad around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lexington and Eddyville. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 236. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
